description: AI-Powered BD Decision Platform for adesso SE - Multi-Agent System with Legal, Reference & Competitor Analysis

features.description: A user can register with email and password
steps: Verify user exists in database with hashed password

features.description: A user can login with email and password
A user can logout and session is destroyed
Role-based access control restricts unauthorized pages
A BD Manager can upload a PDF requirement document
steps: Drag and drop PDF file onto upload zone
Verify BidOpportunity record created with status 'draft'
Verify rawInput contains PDF text extraction

features.description: A BD Manager can enter requirements as free text
steps: Enter project description in textarea (min 50 chars)

features.description: A BD Manager can paste email content as requirement
steps: Verify email metadata (from, subject, date) extracted

features.description: A BD Manager can enable DSGVO document cleaning before processing
steps: Upload PDF with personal data (names, emails, phone numbers)
Verify detected PII items are highlighted
Verify each item shows type (name, email, phone, address)
Verify replacement text shown ([NAME ENTFERNT], etc.)

features.description: A BD Manager can review and selectively keep PII items
steps: Enable DSGVO cleaning on uploaded document
View cleaning preview with detected items
Uncheck specific item to keep (e.g., customer company name)
Verify kept items remain in cleanedText
Verify removed items are replaced with placeholders

features.description: Document cleaning creates audit trail without storing original PII
steps: Verify original document is NOT stored in database
Verify CleaningLog contains item types (not content)
Verify CleaningLog shows removal count per type

features.description: AI extracts structured requirements from uploaded document
steps: Upload document and proceed past cleaning step

features.description: A BD Manager can review and correct extracted requirements
steps: Verify all extracted fields are editable
Add missing technology to technologies array

features.description: Quick Scan automatically detects customer website tech stack
steps: Confirm extracted requirements (includes customer website URL)
Verify QuickScan record created with status 'running'
Verify agent navigates to customer website
Verify CMS detection runs (WordPress, Drupal, Typo3, etc.)

features.description: Quick Scan analyzes content volume from sitemap
steps: Verify sitemap parsing extracts all URLs
Verify URLs categorized by pattern (/news/, /events/, etc.)

features.description: Quick Scan identifies features and integrations
steps: Quick Scan crawls customer website pages
Verify hasEcommerce boolean set if shop found
Verify hasUserAccounts boolean set if login found

features.description: Quick Scan provides BL recommendation with confidence
steps: Quick Scan completes tech stack analysis
Verify AI matches detected tech against BusinessLine.technologies
Verify matchedTechnologies shows which techs matched

features.description: Quick Scan completes within 5 minutes
steps: Start Quick Scan on typical customer website
Verify duration is less than 5 minutes
Verify all required fields populated despite time constraint

features.description: Bit/No Bit evaluation runs automatically after Quick Scan
steps: Verify Bit evaluation agent starts automatically
Verify capability check tool is called
Verify competition check tool is called
Verify Quick Scan results are incorporated

features.description: Bit evaluation assesses capability match against Business Lines
steps: Bit evaluation agent runs capability check
Verify extracted technologies matched against all BLs

features.description: Bit evaluation assesses deal quality (budget, timeline, margin)
steps: Bit evaluation agent runs deal quality check

features.description: Bit evaluation assesses strategic fit
steps: Bit evaluation agent runs strategic fit check

features.description: Bit evaluation performs competition presence check
steps: Bit evaluation agent runs competition check
Verify competition presence detected (not detailed analysis)

features.description: Bit evaluation produces final decision with confidence
steps: Verify BitDecision data stored on BidOpportunity

features.description: No Bit decision includes alternative recommendation
steps: Trigger evaluation for requirement with poor PHP fit
Verify AI checks other Business Lines for better fit
Verify alternativeRecommendation populated if match found
Verify alternative includes BL name and reasoning
Verify BD sees alternative suggestion in UI

features.description: Low confidence Bit decision shows warning and requires confirmation
steps: Verify warning banner displayed to BD
Verify warning explains low confidence factors

features.description: Automatic BL routing based on Quick Scan recommendation
steps: Verify BL recommendation from Quick Scan displayed
Verify assignedBusinessLineId set to recommended BL

features.description: BD can override AI BL recommendation with reason
steps: View BL assignment screen with AI recommendation

features.description: BL receives notification when opportunity is assigned
steps: Verify email subject contains customer name
Verify email body includes opportunity summary
Verify email includes link to review page

features.description: Deep Migration Analysis starts automatically after BL assignment
steps: Verify targetTechnologyId set from BL default technology

features.description: Deep Analysis maps content architecture to target CMS
steps: Deep Analysis agent runs content architecture phase
Verify page types identified and categorized
Verify each item mapped to target CMS equivalent

features.description: Deep Analysis assesses migration complexity
steps: Deep Analysis agent runs migration assessment

features.description: Deep Analysis runs WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility audit
steps: Deep Analysis agent runs accessibility phase
Verify homepage and key pages audited

features.description: Deep Analysis calculates PT estimation using CMS baseline
steps: Deep Analysis agent runs estimation phase
Verify entity counts multiplied by complexity hours
Verify buffer applied based on risk

features.description: Deep Analysis runs as background job and notifies BL when complete
steps: Deep Analysis starts as background job
Verify BD/BL can continue other work during analysis
Verify currentPhase updates as analysis progresses
Verify in-app notification badge appears for BL

features.description: BL can change target CMS and re-run Deep Analysis
steps: Select different technology (e.g., Ibexa instead of Drupal)
Verify old analysis preserved for comparison

features.description: BL sees scenario-based financial projections
steps: Verify Best Case scenario card shown
Verify Expected Case scenario card shown
Verify Worst Case scenario card shown
Verify each scenario shows revenue, costs, margin
Verify risk factors listed per scenario

features.description: BL can explore skill gaps interactively
steps: Verify required skills from requirements listed
Verify available employees with matching skills shown
Click on specific skill to see employee details
Verify drill-down shows availability and experience

features.description: BL sees PT estimation from Deep Analysis
steps: Verify baseline comparison shown (vs. adessoCMS etc.)

features.description: AI suggests optimal team based on requirements
steps: Verify suggested team members listed with roles
Verify each suggestion shows skill match reasoning
Verify availability status shown per person

features.description: BL can modify AI team suggestion
steps: View AI team suggestion as BL
Verify changes reflected in team preview
Verify team still meets minimum role requirements

features.description: BL assigns team with all required roles
steps: Verify at least one developer assigned

features.description: Team assignment handles employees with skill gaps
steps: View team suggestion with skill gap warning
Verify gap clearly highlighted (missing skill X)
Verify gap noted in team assignment data
Verify BL sees confirmation warning about gap

features.description: BL can notify team with one click
Team members receive email with PDF attachment
steps: Verify email sent to each team member
Verify email subject contains customer name
Verify email body includes role assignment
Verify email body includes BL signature

features.description: PDF is generated with correct content and adesso branding
steps: Open PDF and verify adesso logo present

features.description: BidOpportunity transitions to handed_off after notification
steps: Wait for all emails sent successfully

features.description: User sees live Agent activity stream during all AI operations
steps: Start any AI operation (extraction, quick scan, bit eval)
Verify tool calls shown with name and inputs
Verify tool results shown after completion

features.description: User can expand agent thoughts to see full chain-of-thought
steps: Verify expansion shows full reasoning text

features.description: Confidence indicators show color-coded levels
steps: View any agent decision with confidence score
Verify 60-79% shows yellow indicator with warning
Verify <60% shows red indicator with required confirmation

features.description: User can abort any running agent operation
steps: Start long-running agent operation (e.g., Deep Analysis)

features.description: BD Manager sees pipeline overview on dashboard
steps: Verify pipeline overview shows all bid statuses
Verify quick stats visible (bit rate, open evaluations)

features.description: BD Manager can filter bids by status, date, BL
steps: Verify bids filtered by created date
Verify bids filtered by assigned BL

features.description: BD Manager can view all bids (read-only for others' bids)
steps: View bid created by BD Manager B

features.description: BL sees inbox with assigned opportunities
steps: Verify only opportunities assigned to this BL shown
Verify status indicators (analyzing, ready for review)

features.description: Admin can create new Business Line
Admin can add technology with baseline to Business Line
steps: Verify Technology created and linked to BL

features.description: Admin can create employee with skills
Admin can bulk import employees via CSV
Admin can view audit trail for overrides
steps: Verify each entry shows user, timestamp, reason
Verify previous and new values shown
Click entry to see full details

features.description: Admin can invite new user with role
steps: Verify registration page with preset role
Verify user created with correct role

features.description: Dashboard shows Bit/No Bit rate statistics
steps: Verify Bit/No Bit pie chart displayed
Verify chart updates with filtered data

features.description: Analytics shows distribution by Business Line
steps: Verify each BL shows opportunity count
Verify Bit rate per BL shown
Click BL segment to filter details

features.description: Analytics shows pipeline funnel metrics
steps: Verify stages: Draft → Bit → Assigned → Notified

features.description: Analytics shows Time to Decision metric
steps: Verify average time from upload to Bit/No Bit shown
Verify breakdown by time period available

features.description: Analytics shows Source Distribution (Reactive vs Proactive)
steps: Verify clickable to filter by source

features.description: Analytics shows Stage Distribution (Cold/Warm/RFP)
steps: Verify clickable to filter by stage

features.description: Smart Upload processing completes in under 30 seconds
steps: Wait for status change from 'uploading' to 'draft'

features.description: AI Extraction completes in under 60 seconds
steps: Start AI extraction on uploaded document

features.description: Quick Scan completes in 2-5 minutes
steps: Trigger Quick Scan on standard website

features.description: Bit/No Bit decision completes in 5-15 minutes
steps: Wait for bitDecision to be set

features.description: Deep Migration Analysis completes in 10-30 minutes
Extended Evaluation completes in under 2 minutes
steps: Start Extended Evaluation after Bit decision

features.description: Team Notification completes in under 30 seconds
steps: Verify all team members received notification

features.description: AI agent failure triggers automatic retry (3x)
steps: Verify second retry attempt if first fails
Verify third retry attempt if second fails

features.description: Website unreachable during Quick Scan handled gracefully
steps: Start Quick Scan with unreachable URL
Verify user sees clear error message
Verify option to update URL and retry
Verify workflow can continue without scan

features.description: No BL match shows error with manual selection option
steps: Complete Quick Scan with no BL match
Verify error message explains no match
Verify all BLs shown for manual selection

features.description: Dark mode toggle switches theme
steps: Click dark mode toggle in header

features.description: In-app notification badge shows unread count
steps: Assign new opportunity to BL (from another session)

features.description: System shows hint about previous bids for same customer
steps: Create new bid for 'Kunde A' (same customer name)
Verify link to view previous bids
Click link and verify history visible

features.description: Deadline alerts shown in dashboard
steps: Verify visual indicator for approaching deadlines

features.description: Legal Agent detects contract type from uploaded document
steps: Verify Legal Agent starts automatically in parallel with other agents
Verify contract type detected (EVB-IT, Werkvertrag, Dienstvertrag, Rahmenvertrag, SLA)

features.description: Legal Agent identifies risk factors in contract terms
steps: Verify Legal Agent analyzes contract risks
Verify specific risks identified (unlimited liability, unfair penalties, IP issues)
Verify recommendations for risk mitigation provided

features.description: Legal Agent performs compliance check (procurement law)
steps: Verify procurement law type detected (VOB, VGV, UVgO, EU threshold)

features.description: Legal Agent checks framework agreement compliance
steps: Verify existing framework identified if known

features.description: Legal Agent analyzes subcontractor requirements
Legal red flags shown as informative (not blocking)
steps: Upload document with critical legal issues
Verify Legal Agent identifies critical red flags
Verify red flags displayed prominently in UI
Verify BD can still proceed with Bit decision
Verify no automatic No Bit from legal issues alone
Verify red flags included in Coordinator synthesis

features.description: BL receives comprehensive legal review after assignment
steps: Verify comprehensive Legal Agent review starts
Verify BL sees complete legal analysis in review

features.description: System detects unrealistic budget as red flag
steps: Upload document with very low budget for scope
Verify red flag generated for unrealistic budget

features.description: System detects unrealistic timeline as red flag
steps: Verify red flag generated for unrealistic timeline

features.description: Red flags categorized by type and severity
Multi-dimensional risk assessment covers all 5 dimensions
steps: Verify individual risks listed per dimension
Verify mitigation suggestions provided where applicable
Verify RiskAssessment included in BitDecision output

features.description: System extracts award criteria from tender document
steps: Upload tender document with award criteria

features.description: System matches adesso strengths against award criteria
steps: Verify AI matches criteria against adesso capabilities
Verify each criterion gets match score (strong/moderate/weak)
Verify reasoning provided for each match

features.description: BD can add new reference to central database
steps: Verify Reference created with createdBy set

features.description: Admin can validate submitted references
steps: Verify validatedBy set to admin ID

features.description: Reference Agent automatically matches references to opportunity
steps: Start Bit evaluation with extracted requirements
Verify Reference Agent starts in parallel

features.description: BD can add new competency to central database
Tech Agent automatically matches competencies to requirements
steps: Start Bit evaluation with tech requirements
Verify Tech Agent queries competency database
Verify experts found for each competency
Verify gaps identified for missing competencies
Verify competency match result included in evaluation

features.description: BD can add competitor to central database
BD can log encounter with competitor
steps: Verify encounter added to recentEncounters array

features.description: Competition Agent identifies likely competitors for opportunity
steps: Verify Competition Agent starts in parallel
Verify AI analyzes industry and requirements

features.description: BD can create new account for customer
steps: Verify account appears in account list

features.description: BD can assign opportunity to account
steps: In upload flow, search for account
Select existing account or create new
Verify opportunity appears in account detail page

features.description: Dashboard shows opportunities grouped by account
steps: Verify opportunities grouped under account headers
Verify account summary shows opportunity count

features.description: Account detail page shows all opportunities for customer
steps: Verify link to create new opportunity for account

features.description: BD can provide subjective assessment via sliders
System suggests subjective values based on history
steps: Open assessment for customer with history
Verify suggestions based on similar past opportunities
Verify BD can override any suggestion

features.description: Subjective assessment included in Coordinator synthesis
steps: Verify Coordinator Agent receives subjective data
Verify subjective factors appear in decision tree
Verify BD perspective reflected in recommendation

features.description: Bit/No Bit recommendation shown as interactive decision tree
steps: Verify root node shows final recommendation
Verify child nodes show contributing factors

features.description: Decision tree nodes are clickable for details
Decision tree shows pro and contra arguments
steps: Verify top 3-5 arguments per side shown
Verify arguments linked to tree nodes

features.description: Coordinator Agent synthesizes all partial agent results
steps: Wait for all parallel agents to complete
Verify Coordinator Agent starts after all complete
Verify Coordinator receives Tech, Legal, Commercial, Competition, Reference results

features.description: Multi-agent progress shown in UI during evaluation
steps: Verify Coordinator starts when all complete

features.description: Agents run in parallel for faster evaluation
steps: Verify agents don't wait for each other
Verify total time less than sequential sum
Verify all results available for Coordinator

features.description: BD can mark opportunity as won or lost
